title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard, the following message appears at the top: 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists', even before any package name is entered. The user wants to know the meaning of this message and if it indicates an error. The package name field is currently empty.
EB: The message should not be displayed when the package name field is empty. Additionally, if it is an error, it should be displayed in red with the error icon.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java project. 
2. Select the project. 
3. Invoke the New Package Wizard.
